Package com.yantra.interop.japi

Provides the classes to support interoperability.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    YIFAdapter
    This is the interface that the user needs to implement when configuring new Adapters that will be added to the ServiceBuilder Framework.
    YIFCustomApi
    Implement this interface in any custom API, configured in the service definition framework, to access name/value pairs set in configuration of the custom API.
    YIFDataSecurityValidator
    Implement this interface to provide custom data security validations.
    YIFErrorSequenceUE
    This interface is invoked for each asynchronous service with a receiver.
    YIFExceptionGroupFinder  
    YIFHTTPDataTransformer
    This interface is responsible for transforming XML data to/from an HTTP transport in the SDF.
    YIFHttpParams
    Represents data flowing to an HTTP component.
    YIFQueueDetermination  
    YIFRestartableApi  
    YIFXMLAttrOverride
    This interface is used to extend the capabilities of the Defaulting Component.
    YIFXMLAttrOverrideExtn
    added for CR68072 npathak
    YIFXrefValueInterface  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    YIFClientFactory
    The methods provided in this class return an implementation of the YIFApi interface.
    YIFHttpParams.ParamType  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ServiceSuspendException  
    YIFClientCreationException  

Package com.yantra.interop.japi Description

Provides the classes to support interoperability.
